Package infpp.streetlife.model

Class MovingStreetObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • infpp.streetlife.model.StreetObject
      • infpp.streetlife.model.MovingStreetObject
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Car, Frog
    public abstract class MovingStreetObject
extends StreetObject
    Class for moving Street Objects. Every moving Street object has a velocity and a move() method.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
